LanguageData.TENN.mindaily: Minimum daily tenant contract payment: {0} silver.
LanguageData.TENN.maxdaily: Maximum daily tenant contract payment: {0} silver.
LanguageData.TENN.chancesatisified: Chance of contract extension when the tenant is satisfied: {0}%.
LanguageData.TENN.chanceokay: Chance of contract extension when the tenant is okay: {0}%.
LanguageData.TENN.chancedissatisfied: Chance of contract extension when the tenant is dissatisfied: {0}%.
LanguageData.TENN.harborpenalty: Faction penalty to relations for harboring fugitives: {0}.
LanguageData.TENN.accidentspenalty: Faction penalty to relations for harboring fugitives: {0}.
LanguageData.TENN.needlevel: Needed level of tenancy happiness to do labor: {0}.
LanguageData.TENN.spawnnoweapons.tooltip: Keep in mind that this removes any weapon when a tenant spawns. Have you given a weapon to a tenant once before, it'll be removed should they leave the map and spawn again somewhere.
LanguageData.TENN.spawnsimpleclothing.tooltip: Upon tenant creation, tenants will spawn with simpler clothing within the selected value range.
LanguageData.TENN.mole.tooltip: Some tenants can be moles from hostile factions and will send info for an attack.
LanguageData.TENN.wanted.tooltip: Some tenants can be wanted by other factions that will not like the helping of a fugitive.
LanguageData.TENN.royalty.tooltip: Allow tenants with royal titles that needs to be satisfied.
LanguageData.TENN.gastronomy.guests.tooltip: If checked Tennants count as guests, if unchecked they count as colonists
